title: Cut the Rope experiments-v1.0-JimmyHACK.ipa
description:
Cut the Rope: Experiments HD
Description
What on earth is Om Nom?! ThatÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s what millions of fans of the widely acclaimed game, Cut the Rope, have been asking about the cute little monster who eats candy like its his job! 
That same question has a mad (but not bad) scientist studying the little creature that mysteriously arrived outside his house. Intrigued by Om NomÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s insatiable appetite for sweets, the Professor puts him through a series of experiments in this all-new game, a follow-up to one of the most original and fun-filled games on the App Store. 

A NEW TWIST ON THE FAMILIAR AND HIGHLY ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY 
Cut the Rope: Experiments combines the same rope-cutting and monster-feeding action that millions of people around the globe have come to love, with new features and gameplay elements including Rope Shooters and Suction-cups. Can you help the Professor and Om Nom get through these wacky experiments? 
- 75 new experiments (levels) across 3 colorful new settings, with more to come! 
- 3 level packs: Getting Started, Shooting the Candy, Sticky Steps 
- New musical tracks, sounds and Om Nom animations 

MEET THE PROFESSOR! 
Meet the newest character in Om NomÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s adventures! The wacky Professor adds colorful commentary in response to gameplay achievements (or lack thereof!), adding a new element of interaction between the player and the game. How did Om Nom end up outside the scientistÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s house? And why is he so intrigued with the little creature? 
- Find hidden photo evidence to help the scientist with his experiments! Complete the professorÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s photo album and share with your friends on Facebook. Discover a special photo only available in the HD version!
- New animated storyline featuring the professorÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s intriguing commentary and reactions to Om NomÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s behavior ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ What will he think of YOUR achievements?

ALL NEW LEVELS ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ SAME GREAT FEATURES 
- Game Center support for achievements and leaderboards - compare your progress to other rope cutters around the world! 
- ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œGift This AppÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ option makes it easy to share Om Nom with friends 

COMING SOON! GET THE COMIC BOOK! 
In Cut the Rope: Experiments, Om NomÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s story begins to unfold. Follow the adventures of Om Nom, the Professor and more interesting new characters in the Cut the Rope Comic Book, coming soon to the App Store
